metadata.name: Taking Flight in Venice Beach
metadata.description:
A 1/1 photograph created by Burnish: A talented dude defying gravity at the Venice Beach skate park. This image was created in October 2022 as part of my "Gift of Time" collection of adventures. @JustinAversano chose this adventure for me by collecting my "Los Angeles Dreaming" NFT, and received this 1/1 photograph in return. 

I took a month off my dayjob in October 2022 and embarked on photographic adventures chosen by my collectors. I love Los Angeles, and was grateful to spend a few days there with no responsibilities other than photographing and exploring. Venice Beach is always an interesting scene, so I spent a sunny afternoon there with my camera and was rewarded with a few amazing shots. Thanks to the crew at the skate park, who are both very insular and intent on their craft, and absolutely aware they're on display for others to enjoy.
